name: Tam's Harvest
description:
Tam has a simple dream, he wants to make the worlds's best fruit salad!  But this is easier said than done, help Tam on his journey!

Tam's Harvest is a 2D-Pixel  Platformer  were you play as the titular character    Tam . Your goal is to collect a given amount   of    fruits to unlock abilities to finish  the level. 

Tam's Harvest has   2 levels where the player can explore and collect.

Controls

Credits

Music   and Sound by   We Love Indies

Art made with Aseprite and  Adobe Photoshop

Made with Unity 

Special Thanks to ....

.... my friends  who always had a   open ear for my  whining 

and 

everyone  who helped me develop this game!

 

Thanks for Playing!
